channel.title: 纽约时报-全球
channel.description: 这是一个追踪纽约时报-全球news的种子

item.title: 海地一名法官起诉了 51 人，指控他们在 2021 年暗杀总统约韦内尔-莫伊塞的事件中扮演了角色，其中包括他的妻子马丁-莫伊塞，她被指控是共犯，尽管她在袭击中受了重伤。
item.description: A Haitian judge has indicted 51 people for their roles in the 2021 assassination of President Jovenel Moïse, including his wife, Martine Moïse, who is accused of being an accomplice, despite being seriously wounded in the attack. nyti.ms/3T1V1ka

item.title:
俄罗斯最著名的反对派领导人的妻子尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜亚长期以来一直回避聚光灯，但他在狱中的死亡可能会让她无法回避。
"她说："我没有权利放弃。
item.description:
Yulia Navalnaya, the wife of Russia’s most famous opposition leader, long shunned the spotlight, but his death in prison may make that impossible.

“I have no right to give up,” she said. nyti.ms/3OR2lN4

item.title: 香港居民发现，隔壁的内地城市深圳物价更低、服务更好、美食更美味。
item.description: Hong Kong residents are finding in Shenzhen, the mainland city next door, lower prices, better service and tasty cuisine. nyti.ms/3I7pLd8

item.title: 周二，韩国各大医院的数百名实习生和住院医师离职，中断了一项基本服务，以抗议政府计划通过招收更多医学院学生来解决医生短缺问题。
item.description: Hundreds of interns and residents at major South Korean hospitals walked off the job on Tuesday, disrupting an essential service to protest the government’s plan to address a shortage of doctors by admitting more students to medical school. nyti.ms/3SJTBtk

item.title: 虽然纳瓦尔尼的死因不明，但他的支持者担心，残酷的监禁条件可能会夺走他的生命。
item.description: Aunque se desconoce la causa de la muerte de Alexéi Navalny, sus colaboradores temían que las brutales condiciones del encierro pudieran costarle la vida. nyti.ms/3I3m0Wc

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼从狱中发出的信件摘录揭示了这位曾激发反对弗拉基米尔-普京总统的领袖的雄心、决心和好奇心。
item.description: Excerpts of letters that Aleksei Navalny sent from prison reveal the depth of the ambition, resolve and curiosity of a leader who galvanized the opposition to President Vladimir Putin. nyti.ms/42H6CIF

item.title: 纳瓦尔尼的女发言人说，俄罗斯当局延长了对阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼死亡事件的调查，并再次阻止反对派领导人的母亲去看他的遗体。
item.description: The Russian authorities have extended their investigation into the death of Aleksei Navalny and have again blocked the opposition leader’s mother from seeing his body, Mr. Navalny’s spokeswoman said. nyti.ms/3I7GhKl

item.title: 本周，世界最高法院将首次在海牙听取有关以色列占领巴勒斯坦领土问题的辩论，试图就这一具有分歧的问题提出咨询意见。
item.description: In The Hague this week for the first time, the world’s highest court will hear arguments on the Israeli occupation of the Palestinian territories as it seeks to offer an advisory opinion on the divisive issue nyti.ms/42JcQrm

item.title: 根据联合国的数据，非洲是世界上杀害妇女（或与性别相关的杀害妇女行为）发生率最高的地区。活动家和家庭指责政府官员忽视这一问题，并将责任归咎于受害者。
item.description: Africa has the highest rate of femicide — or gender-related killings of women— in the world, according to the United Nations. Activists and families accuse officials of ignoring the issue and blaming the victims. nyti.ms/3T4Ciof

item.title: 塔利班抵制了联合国关于阿富汗问题的会议，表示不会参加包括阿富汗民间社会、妇女权利团体和欧盟代表在内的会议。
item.description: The Taliban boycotted a U.N. conference on Afghanistan, saying it would not take part in a conference that also included representatives of Afghan civil society, women’s rights groups and the European Union. nyti.ms/49FKjVT

item.title:
RT by @nytimesworld: 随着委内瑞拉和圭亚那之间紧张局势的加剧，伯利兹和危地马拉之间的另一场领土争端也有可能破坏中美洲的稳定。
与 @alecegarra 和 @JodyReporta 合作
item.description:
Mientras las tensiones aumentan entre Venezuela y Guyana, otra disputa territorial, entre Belice y Guatemala, tiene el potencial de desestabilizar América Central

con @alecegarra y @JodyReporta

nytimes.com/es/2024/02/18/es…

item.title: Wil Maheia 对自己的政府在危地马拉入侵伯利兹领土时无所作为感到厌烦，于是他组建了自己的志愿者小组，在两国都声称拥有主权的地区行使伯利兹的主权。
item.description: Harto de lo que consideraba la inacción de su propio gobierno ante las incursiones guatemaltecas en territorio beliceño, Wil Maheia formó su propio grupo de voluntarios para hacer respetar la soberanía de Belice en zonas reclamadas por ambos países. nyti.ms/49imaVO

item.title: 匈牙利是最后一个阻止瑞典加入北约的国家，它对美国竖起了大拇指，拒绝会见由两党参议员组成的代表团，该代表团是来迫使维克托-欧尔班总理的政府批准北欧国家加入北约的。
item.description: Hungary, the last holdout blocking Sweden’s NATO entry, thumbed its nose at the U.S., declining to meet with a bipartisan delegation of senators who had come to press the government of Prime Minister Viktor Orban to approve the Nordic nation’s entry. nyti.ms/3uKYXwb

item.title: 即时新闻：阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼（Aleksei Navalny）的遗孀承诺将继续他的工作，建设一个民主的俄罗斯，并将自己视为一股政治力量。
item.description: Breaking News: Aleksei Navalny’s widow pledged to continue his work to build a democratic Russia, presenting herself as a political force. nyti.ms/3SEtpQG

item.title:
RT by @nytimesworld：#BREAKING: Ursula von der Leyen 将寻求连任欧盟委员会主席
(对业内人士来说，这是一个突破：这是我们《纽约时报》第一次在标题中使用她的名字，表明已经达到了可识别的门槛）
item.description:
#BREAKING: Ursula von der Leyen To Seek Second Term As European Commission President

(for the insiders, a breakthrough: this is the 1st time we at the New York Times use her name in a headline, indicating a recognizability threshold has been met)

nytimes.com/2024/02/19/world…

item.title: 根据联合国的数据，非洲是世界上与性别相关的杀害妇女事件发生率最高的地区。活动人士指责政府官员忽视这一问题，并将责任归咎于受害者。
item.description: Africa has the highest rate of gender-related killings of women in the world, according to the United Nations. Activists accuse officials of ignoring the issue and blaming the victims. nyti.ms/3T2wR91

item.title: 周日，在巴布亚新几内亚偏远的高原地区发生了一场枪战，造成二十多人死亡。最近这起事件的确切原因仍不清楚。
item.description: More than two dozen people were killed in a gunfight on Sunday in the remote highlands of Papua New Guinea, where deadly violence between more than a dozen tribal groups has been escalating. The precise cause of the latest episode remained unclear. nyti.ms/3T0PR82

item.title: 上周五，阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼在北极偏远地区的监狱中去世，成千上万的俄罗斯人试图表达对他的哀思，而俄罗斯警察则进行了镇压，暂时拘留了数百人，并将二十多人关进监狱。
item.description: As thousands of Russians tried to give voice to their grief for Aleksei Navalny, who died in a remote Arctic penal colony on Friday, Russian police officers cracked down, temporarily detaining hundreds of people and placing more than two dozen in jail. nyti.ms/49CzmEt

item.title: 过去三天，西方国家领导人齐聚慕尼黑，弗拉基米尔-普京总统向他们传达了一个信息：他们迄今所做的一切都不会改变普京破坏当前世界秩序的意图。
item.description: As the leaders of the West gathered in Munich over the past three days, President Vladimir Putin had a message for them: Nothing they’ve done so far would alter his intentions to disrupt the current world order. nyti.ms/3T3jIN4

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的去世让世界各国领导人和示威者悲痛不已，但同时也让俄罗斯失去了一个有魅力的抗衡者，来对抗弗拉基米尔-普京总统日益加剧的镇压政策。
item.description: Aleksei Navalny’s death united world leaders and demonstrators in grief, but it also left Russia without a charismatic counterweight to President Vladimir Putin’s increasingly repressive policies. nyti.ms/3Td4SE1

item.title: 夺取阿夫迪夫卡后，乌克兰部队需要在不平坦的地形上建立新的防线，而俄罗斯则试图扩大优势。
item.description: After the capture of Avdiivka, Ukrainian forces will need a new defensive line in unforgiving terrain, while Russia tries to press its advantage. nyti.ms/49i38yx

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼在俄罗斯监狱中死亡，这对以他为代表的反对派运动是一个打击。但这也为建立反对弗拉基米尔-普京总统的统一战线带来了希望。
item.description: The death of Aleksei Navalny in a Russian prison has been a blow to an opposition movement in which he was the figurehead. But it has also raised hopes of a united front against President Vladimir Putin. nyti.ms/3T1SAy1

item.title: 在加拿大一个率先减少伤害的省份，一个城市就可能建立安全消费场所的问题举行了一场激烈的辩论。
item.description: In a Canadian province that pioneered harm reduction, one city held a raucous debate over the possible creation of a safe consumption site. nyti.ms/49B9h8N

item.title: 在以色列占领的约旦河西岸举办的一个展览展出了加沙艺术家的作品，这些作品唤起了人们对巴勒斯坦生活和抗议的回忆。但是，这次展览也同样展出了因战争而永远消失的无法展出的艺术作品。
item.description: An exhibition in the Israeli-occupied West Bank features works by Gazan artists evoking Palestinian life and protest. But the show is as much about the art that cannot be displayed, lost forever to the war. nyti.ms/49jl38g

item.title: 在俄罗斯的长期进攻接近尾声时，仍有数百名平民留在阿夫迪夫卡。那些在最后几周逃出来的人讲述了无情的破坏。
item.description: Toward the end of Russia’s long assault, hundreds of civilians still remained in Avdiivka. Those who escaped in the last weeks spoke of relentless devastation. nyti.ms/49lcWYG

item.title: 周六，一名巴基斯坦高级官员承认帮助操纵了该国的选举结果--这一令人震惊的说法使人们更加感到这次投票是巴基斯坦历史上最不可信的选举之一。
item.description: A senior Pakistani official confessed on Saturday to helping manipulate results in the country’s elections — a startling claim strengthening a sense that the vote was among the least credible in Pakistan’s history. nyti.ms/49jE4HE

item.title: 泰国假释了他信-西那瓦（Thaksin Shinawatra），这位下台的前总理因腐败和滥用权力的指控而被定罪。他最近的举动让追随者们心灰意冷。
item.description: Thailand has paroled Thaksin Shinawatra, the ousted former prime minister who was convicted on charges of corruption and abuse of power. His recent moves have disillusioned followers. nyti.ms/49g6UJ5

item.title: 以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡周六坚称，以色列不会屈服于国际压力，取消地面入侵拉法的计划。
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu insisted on Saturday that Israel would not bow to international pressure to call off its plan for a ground invasion of Rafah, the southernmost city in Gaza that is now packed with more than a million Palestinians. nyti.ms/3wlPw6W

item.title: 周六，数千名反政府示威者挤满了特拉维夫市中心的一条大道，这是几个月来对本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理最大规模的愤怒示威。
item.description: Thousands of antigovernment protesters on Saturday filled a central Tel Aviv thoroughfare in the largest show of anger toward Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in months. nyti.ms/3UL60jd

item.title: 虽然 Aleksei A. Navalny 的死因不详，但他的工作人员经常担心，在越来越残酷的监狱中强加给他的残酷条件可能会导致他的死亡。
item.description: Although Aleksei A. Navalny’s cause of death is not known, his staff often worried that brutal conditions imposed on him in ever crueler prisons might lead to his death. nyti.ms/49jdMVY
